April 18, 1949 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Third Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-of-leicester-brass-band-festival-3rd-section
Lancaster Hall, Leicester Prizes - 1st £12, 2nd £8, 3rd £6, 4th £4. 22nd annual contest. 18 bands competed.
Nov. 5, 2013, 1:44 p.m. Feb. 26, 2019, 11:48 a.m.
1 Jaguar Land Rover Band Jack Major
2 Burbage Silver Band A. Bennett
3 Maltby Miners Welfare Band C. Allison
4 Harworth Brass George Thorpe
